description:
Whether you’re living a jet setting lifestyle, or you just want to keep track of your European Zwift buddy’s time zone, this watch will keep you on time in multiple locations. Sitting below the Wayfinder’s 3 hands, is a 4th dual time zone hand. This 4th hand sweeps its way around the dial, pointing to the 24-hour indices that mark out your chosen second time zone.

  • Highly accurate Swiss Quartz movement means more precision and less setting the time
  • Dual time zone complication for tracking the time in multiple locations
  • Titanium case keeps weight low and strength high
  • Rugged sapphire crystal is virtually scratch proof and has an anti-reflective coating on the underside
  • Glowing super-luminova hands and hour indices on the black and a fully luminous face on the white, keep your watch easy to ready in the dark
  • Screw-down crown seals water out and is comfortably offset at 4 o’clock
  • Date complication gives you an option to checking your phone
  • Handsome leather strap wears well
name: Momentum Wayfinder GMT
